[vc_row][vc_column]

PET Bottles With the Handle

[vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

→ Brief Introduction

[vc_column_text]The PET bottles with the handles are getting more popular in the beverage and containers for the kitchen.WASHUNprovides different solution for the PET bottles with the handle; the integral handles PET bottles range is from the 0.1L up to 20L. The special designed air cooling spot and handle insert type of blow moulds are applied for blowing the handled bottles, also the post handle inserting machine is available for the higher output needs.[/vc_column_text]
Applications
Edible oil, pharmacy, agrochemicals
Advantages
Less weight comparing the extrusion blow molded bottles
Transparence bottles
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4370″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]WASHUN Machinery, the Professional blow molding equipments supplier in China.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

→ Related Blow Molding Machines:

[vc_column_text]By the Post Handle Insert Method
– MG-SS Stretch blow molding machine
– MG-E Stretch blow molding machine
– RB Rotary Stretch blow molding machine
– EB Electric Stretch blow molding machine
– Semi-automatic blow moulding machines
– SA series blow moulding machines
By the Inside Mould Method
– Semi-automatic blow moulding machines[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
